Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute at Ewing/93rd
ShortDescription: 30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Ewing, South Chicago and Ewing due to, street blockage near Ewing/93rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ewing, South Chicago and Ewing due to, street blockage near Ewing/93rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Western (FP)
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Western (FP Branch) due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Western (Forest Park Branch) due to a sick customer. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
